org.eclipse.smarthome.core.items

Class ManagedItemProviderOSGiTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.smarthome.test.java.JavaTest
      • org.eclipse.smarthome.test.java.JavaOSGiTest
        • org.eclipse.smarthome.core.items.ManagedItemProviderOSGiTest

  • public class ManagedItemProviderOSGiTest
extends JavaOSGiTest
    The ManagedItemProviderOSGiTest runs inside an OSGi container and tests the ManagedItemProvider.
    Author:
    Thomas Eichstaedt-Engelen - Initial contribution, Kai Kreuzer - added tests for repeated addition and removal, Andre Fuechsel - added tests for tags, Simon Kaufmann - added test for late registration of item factory
